# Social Security taxable wage bases and tax ceilings
## 
### 
Taxable earnings base is the maximum annual earn
ings subject to Social Security tax. Figures for 1984
and 1985 are projections.
Taxable Maximum
earnings employee
base annual tax
1937-49 $3,000 J^: 00
1950 3,000 _45 0°
1951-53 3.600 54 00
1954 3,600 72 00
1955-56 4,200 84 00
1957-58 4.200 94 50
1959 4,800 120 00
1960-61 4,800 144 00
i 1962 ~ 4.800 150.00
1963-65 4,800 174 00
, 1966 6,600 277.20
1967 6,600 290.40
1968 ABOO 34320
1969-70 7,800 374 40
1971 7.800 40560
1972 9,000 46800
1973 10,800 631.80
1974 13,200 77220
1975 14,T00 824 85
1976 15,300 895 05
1977 16,500 965 25
1978 17,700 1,070 85
1979 22,900 1,403 77
1980 25,900 1,587 67
1981 29,700 1.975 05
1982 32,400 2.170 80
1983 35J00 2,391.90
1984 39.300 2,633 10
1985 43.200 3,045 60
Sot/rro Social Security Admfntofratton
